data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: The controversial issue of false advertising has launched a heated debate. The causes of this are various, and there are a number of solutions to solve this problem. To begin with, it is undeniable that loopholes in advertising laws are the first and most important reason. That is to say, an amendment to advertising laws is imperative in order to prevent companies from deceiving customers in advertisements. For instance, companies should be required by law to provide customers with all the information regarding the potential risks of the products in their advertisements. Additionally, the lack of proper enforcement of advertising laws also plays a significant role. Therefore, the audit bureau or its equivalent should have a strict standard in place when auditing advertisements and justly grant permission to the ones which meet the standard. Overall, although there are many reasons leading to false advertising, it is obvious that both governments and organizations should work together to solve this problem. (159字)
data.referenceText: Some companies deceive customers in their advertising. What should be done to stop this?
data.referenceTranslate: 有些公司在广告中欺骗顾客。我们应该做些什么来阻止这种情况?
